actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide Homeownership Assistance.

summary.text: Authorizes, from funds previously approved in appropriations Acts for the homeownership assistance program under the National Housing Act, $125,000,000 to be available for contracts to make periodic mortgage assistance payments entered into on or after October 1, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to provide Homeownership Assistance.
